Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm experiencing crashes quite often and I only have a few mods installed

List:

Deadly Reentry

HullCamVDS

KerbalTek (HyperEdit)

NavyFish (Docking alignment mod)

SCANsat+Contract pack

Firespitter (plugin only)

FerramAerospaceResearch

Endurance (Interstellar style parts, engines, science modules ect.)

and Distant Object Enhancements mod.

I'm running a Windows 7 32-bit

Specs:

8gb ram

80gig HD

DXDIAG:

Intel Core 2 Dup CPU E7200 @ 2.53GHz (2 CPUs) ~2.5GHz

Direct X Version: Direct X 11

Error log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wgaqiwoz5hqar9o/error.log?dl=0

Output Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/lg2bbteexmcfrxp/output_log.txt?dl=0

Help would be greatly appreciated!

From your output log:

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Trying to allocate: 22369620B with 4 alignment. MemoryLabel: NewDelete

Allocation happend at: Line:0 in Overloaded New[]

Memory overview

You might want to consider Active Texture Management.

Your 8GB total memory won't help you. 32bit KSP can only use about 3.5GB.

Edited February 10, 2015 by Tex_NL

After inspecting your output_log file, ive noticed u got 3 versions of modulemanager installed! this is conflicting with each other... U have to delete them and only keep the one and only 2.5.9.dll version since that one is the latest,

I would recommend you to install Ksp Addon Version installer, that plugin keeps tracks of your all your mods and their latest version thats out there. It will inform you when a new updated version is out...

U can find the plugin here:

http://ksp-avc.cybutek.net/

Edited February 11, 2015 by renejant
fixed a typo

Output log 2/20- https://www.dropbox.com/s/j7hq5ct2n5r6ecn/output_log.txt?dl=0

Error Log- 2/20- https://www.dropbox.com/s/w2zdo4b2c61saw6/error.log?dl=0

I have done both things, and am still getting crashes.

Here are the mods I'm using with this crash:

Deadly Reentry

KerbalTek (HyperEdit)

NavyFish (Docking alignment mod)

SCANsat+Contract pack

Firespitter (plugin only)

FerramAerospaceResearch

and Distant Object Enhancements mod.

B9 Aerospace (and according mods. IE Klockhead_Martian_Gimbal, MP_Nazari, ect)

ATM

MechJeb2

I have set KSP graphics to the bare minimum as well.
Hey, Admins, could you close this thread when it's pertinent to you? Thanks
